test.name: usecases
test.objective: Main use cases of Socket API

test.name: socket_close
test.objective: Test on possibility of communication endpoint creation

test.name: read_write
test.objective: Test on reliability of the read()/write() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: readv_writev
test.objective: Test on reliability of standard readv()/writev() I/O operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: shutdown_rd
test.objective: Test on reliability of the shutdown() operation for full-duplex connection on the BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: shutdown_wr
test.objective: Test on reliability of the shutdown() operation for full-duplex connection on the BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: shutdown_rdwr
test.objective: Test on reliability of the shutdown() operation for full-duplex connection on the BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: shutdown
test.objective: Test on reliability of the shutdown() operation for full-duplex connection on the BSD compatible sockets. Server side activates shutdown() operation.

test.name: send_recv
test.objective: Test on reliability of the send()/recv() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: sendto_recvfrom
test.objective: Test on reliability of sendto()/recvfrom() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: sendmsg_recvmsg
test.objective: Test on reliability of sendmsg()/recvmsg() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: server
test.objective: Test on reliability of the standard operations on BSD compatible sockets as server application.

test.name: getsockname_getpeername
test.objective: Test on reliability of getsockname()/getpeername() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: select
test.objective: Test on reliability of the select() operation on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: poll
test.objective: Test on reliability of the poll operation on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: ioctl
test.objective: Test on reliability of ioctl() operation on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: get_setsockopt
test.objective: Test on reliability of getsockopt()/setsockopt() operations on BSD compatible sockets.

result.verdict: iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable
iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable
iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable
iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable
iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable
iomux_call() did not mark the socket as readable

test.name: if_nameindex
test.objective: Test on reliability of the following operations: if_nameindex()/if_freenameindex() and if_nametoindex()/if_indextoname().

test.name: multi_clients_handler
test.objective: Check possibility of handling multiple client connections at the same time using fork().

test.name: pipe
test.objective: Test on reliability of the pipe() operations.

test.name: sendmmsg
test.objective: Test on reliability of the sendmmsg() operation on BSD compatible sockets.

result.verdict: sendmmsg() failed with errno ENOSYS
sendmmsg() failed with errno ENOSYS
sendmmsg() failed with errno ENOSYS
sendmmsg() failed with errno ENOSYS
sendmmsg() failed with errno ENOSYS

test.name: multiple_listen
test.objective: Check that listen() can be called multiple times on the same socket and it allows to change its backlog.

result.verdict: Measuring the first backlog: measured backlog is more than expected
Measuring the second backlog: measured backlog is more than expected

results.notes: Verdict about ECONNRESET is expected after fixing L5 bug 75246

result.verdict: Measuring the first backlog: recv() failed with errno RPC-ECONNRESET
Measuring the first backlog: measured backlog is more than expected
Measuring the second backlog: recv() failed with errno RPC-ECONNRESET
Measuring the second backlog: measured backlog is more than expected
Measuring the first backlog: measured backlog is more than expected
Measuring the second backlog: measured backlog is more than expected

results.notes: Verdict about ECONNRESET is expected after fixing L5 bug 75246

result.verdict: Measuring the first backlog: recv() failed with errno RPC-ECONNRESET
Measuring the first backlog: measured backlog is more than expected
Measuring the second backlog: recv() failed with errno RPC-ECONNRESET
Measuring the second backlog: measured backlog is more than expected

test.name: test_bug_33714
test.objective: Check that listen() can be called multiple times on the same socket and it allows to change its backlog.

result.verdict: Real backlog is more than that passed to the first listen() call
Too much time is required to accept all the established connections after the first listen() call
Real backlog is more than that passed to the second listen() call
Too much time is required to accept all the established connections after the second listen() call

Backlog set for the first listen() call is more than backlog set for the second listen() call but the number of successful accept() calls after the first listen() call is less than the number of succesful accept() calls after the second listen() call

test.name: splice
test.objective: Test on reliability of splice() operation on BSD compatible sockets.

test.name: ipv6_del_ll_addrs_transmit
test.objective: Check that connection can be established and/or data can be transmitted after removal of link-local IPv6 addresses and neighbor entries from tested interfaces.

results.notes: Onload fails to send neighbour solicitation when link-local address is removed

result.verdict: Sending data from IUT: Data was sent but peer socket is not readable
